context_for_next_testing_agent: Mission v9.2.5 verified successfully. Key changes: (1) LoadingFallback component at lines 3565-3625 in CoachDashboard.js prevents blank pages during loading, (2) success_url in server.py line 2080 now includes auth=success parameter for guaranteed propulsion, (3) App.js lines 2146-2195 detect auth=success and set localStorage.redirect_to_dash=true for post-login redirect. All 7 Bassi reservations with 04/03/2026 dates are preserved and visible. Debug test confirmed Super Admin badge 'üëë Cr√©dits Illimit√©s', Admin button, and reservations table working correctly.
